name: Starship Workshop
desc: Small scale starship production and refit workshops. Production is small scale and local gravitational conditions affect it's output signifficantly.

name: Orbital Station - Balanced
desc:
A salvaged space station, featuring medium firepower and moderate armor.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Orbital Station - Balanced
desc:
A salvaged battlestation, featuring medium firepower and moderate armor.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.
